name: Terminal Tournament
description:
Foreword: This game is for the GameDev.TV 2022 Gam Jam. This is a first-person shooter inspired by the arena shooters like Unreal Tournament. This will also be my first jam game as a solo developer, ran into a few technical issues along the way, but managed to create a finished experience, hope you enjoy it.

Story: The Nova corporation wishes to test the resilience of our new robotics prototype.

You will guide the prototype through a series of stress tests that result in termination. We look forward to your findings. 

Good Luck.

Core Loop: After gaining enough experience from fallen enemies you may proceed to the next level after death. Each level adds a new weapon.

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Dash: Left Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Attack: Left Mouse

Switch Weapons: Mouse Wheel or 1,2,3,4

Reload: "R" key

Pause Menu: escape

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/Dawnstargames/Terminal-Tournament-

Credits: Used various free assets from the Unity asset store including; Unity Standard Assets, SpaceSkies Free by Pulsar Bytes, The Sci-fi Gun collection from Black Curtain studio, Free Low-poly Sci-fi by Cuboom, Sci-fi gun Heavy from Factory of Models, Sci-fi loops pack 1 by Christopher Baklid,  Sci-fi Music pack by Adam Bielecki, Sci-fi Futuristic handgun from Mobility Arts, Robot 1 by Baydinman, Sci-fi Enemies and Vehicles by Popup Asylum, and Kenney.nl UI Pack: Space Expansion. Environments were made with Probuilder.
